mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from books where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT bi.TITLE, bi.AUTHOR,bi.PUBLISHER,bi.CATEGORY, b.B_STATUS, co.e_id ,b.b_id FROM books b JOIN book_info bi ON b.ISBN = bi.ISBN LEFT JOIN checkout co ON b.b_id = co.b_id WHERE bi.category = #{category} AND co.return_date IS NULL AND b.b_status !='D'
AND bi.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%')
AND bi.AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%')

SELECT bi.TITLE, bi.AUTHOR, bi.PUBLISHER, bi.CATEGORY, b.B_STATUS, e.e_name, b.b_id FROM checkout co JOIN books b ON co.b_id = b.b_id JOIN book_info bi ON b.ISBN = bi.ISBN LEFT JOIN employees e ON co.e_id = e.e_id WHERE b.ISBN IN ( SELECT b2.ISBN FROM checkout co2 JOIN books b2 ON co2.b_id = b2.b_id WHERE co2.b_id = #{id} ) AND co.return_date IS NULL

SELECT bi.TITLE, e.e_name, books.due_date, CONCAT(DATEDIFF(NOW(), books.due_date), 'Ïùº') AS day_difference FROM books JOIN book_info bi ON books.ISBN = bi.ISBN LEFT JOIN checkout co ON books.b_id = co.b_id LEFT JOIN employees e ON co.e_id = e.e_id WHERE books.due_date < CURDATE() AND co.return_date IS NULL
